patterns: What the hell is OSSEC
What do you wish to accomplish in this club
responses: OSSEC(open source software ensi club) goal is to establish the philosophy of open-source and sharing among ENSI students.

patterns: what are the different axes available in ossec
what do you work on in ossec
responses: There's 4 axes in OSSEC: Events, Projects, Magazines and trainings axe!

patterns: what are the events organized by OSSEC throughout the year
what are your events
responses: We have three main events organized during the year. Shell coding, TUNIHACK and Install Party.

patterns: can you inform me more about the shell coding challenge
Can I participate in the shell coding challenge
responses: Shell coding challenge is an event where we test our members about the skills they acquired in shell coding.We also have prizes for the winners!

patterns: What is tunihack
Can i participate in tunihack
What are the requirements to participate in tunihack
responses: Tunihack is an event where participants will compete in 24-hour challenge where they code to tackle real life. Students from all over the country are eligible to participate in teams.There will also be alot of workshops,conferences and fun activities so stay tuned !

patterns: What is the install Party
what do you do in the install party
will we install the linux distribution in the install party
responses: The install party is our first contact with the new members of OSSEC where we help them install linux distribution on their personal computer

patterns: when will be the next Tunihack
what will be the date of the next Tunihack
responses: A date still isn't fixed but follow our social media pages to stay updated!

patterns: when will be the next Shell coding challenge
what will be the date of the next coding shell challenge
responses: A date still isn't fixed but follow our social media pages to stay updated!

patterns: when will be the next Install party
what will be the date of the next Install party
responses: A date still isn't fixed but follow our social media pages to stay updated!

patterns: what are the skills I can gain from OSSEC trainings
what can I learn from joining OSSEC
responses: You can widen your skills in Linux, Android, Web and AI with us!

patterns: what are the skills I can gain from OSSEC web trainings
tell me more about web trainings
what are the different topics in web development that you cover in your trainings
responses: In the first semester we will give to our members an introduction of web development.Train them with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, Javascript and PHP+SQL. In the second semester, we offer a certification in ReactJs that will help you enrich your Curriculum vitae!

patterns: what are the skills I can gain from OSSEC Linux trainings
tell me more about Linux trainings
what are the different topics in Linux  that you cover in your trainings
responses: In the first semester we will give to our members an introduction to unix/linux as well as how to install it in their personal computer and the basic commands.In the second Semester, we will dive deeper into shell scrips, filters and process management.

patterns: what are the skills I can gain from OSSEC Android trainings
tell me more about Android trainings
what are the different topics in Android that you cover in your trainings
responses: We will offer our members a certified training in Android

patterns: what are the skills I can gain from OSSEC AI trainings
tell me more about AI trainings
what are the different topics in AI that you cover in your trainings
responses: We will offer our members a certified training in Android as well as workshops with AI experts.

patterns: where can i find OSSEC published magazines
responses: In our website

patterns: what kind of projects do you do in OSSEC
responses: In the second semester, we do web and AI projects

patterns: Who's behind this Chatbot
Who created you, Mr.Bot
What is this Chatbot
Are you a bot
is this a bot
I think you're a bot
responses: Yup, I am a Chatbot creating by Khaled Krichen,Ala Eddine Elabed,Rawan Ghoudi,Achref Abidi, Med Amine Chargui and Siwar Belloumi in order to help you know more about OSSEC.
